track.strDescriptionEN:
"Wild Ones" is a single recorded by American rapper Flo Rida from his fourth studio album of the same name. The song features vocals by Australian recording artist Sia Furler. It was produced by soFLY & Nius and Axwell. It was released as the album's second single and title track on December 19, 2011 in the United States. A remix version entitled "Wild One Two" by Jack Back featuring David Guetta, Nicky Romero and Sia was released on February 14, 2012. This song along with "Good Feeling" was selected to serve as one of the official theme songs to WrestleMania XXVIII and it was also featured in The Rock's Road to Wrestlemania vignettes where he prepares for his match with John Cena at the event. Flo Rida performed the songs "Good Feeling" and "Wild Ones" live at the event to precede Rock's entrance for the match.

The song performed well accross the world, especially in the Billboard Hot 100 where it's peaked at number five. "Wild Ones" is one of Flo Rida's three singles to be ranked among the top-twenty of the chart's year-end chart of 2012. Interestingly, the number 5-peaked "Wild Ones" got charted way higher (#12) than the other two songs which get higher position, the number 3-peaked "Good Feeling" (#16) and the chart-topper "Whistle" (#17).

The song has been featured in two mash-ups by DJ Earworm, "Fly" and "Shine Brighter".
